name: CUBYCORE
description:
A fun 3d platformer game, jump on the islands, avoid the obstacles, help Cuby to reach the end line!

This is my first game ever! so do not expect a lot.

Feel free to give me your suggestions and issues you find in game. and thanks for downloading! <3

Controls:

Arrows or W, A, S, D to move.

Space to jump.

Made by me: Islam Abukoush.
